entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY THIS MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF FLURRIES THIS AFTERNOON
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO WEST 15 TO 20 MPH THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF SNOW 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 13
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 16
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
